snippet.title: What's next for Jammie Thomas-Rasset?
snippet.description: ...Now that Jammie Thomas-Rasset owed $1.92 million to the recording industry for sharing 24 songs on KaZaA back in 2005, the case might seem to be closed. In reality, though, Thomas-Rasset still has numerous options for dealing with the verdict. Let's run them down.Pay itAccording to Thomas...
